name: Keep Me Sane
description:
After the fall of society, there was nothing left for Mary other than her 2 friends Faith and Jay. She would do anything to help them. Truly anything. But don't worry about that, because nothing bad happens anyway, and there are definitely no surprises in this game. Nope, none whatsoever. I promise.

INSTALL

Extract the .zip file and run the "MonoGameWindowsStarter.exe" file

CONTROLS

Mouse Click (m1): Advance text / Skip scrolling animation

ESC: Exit the game

OUTSIDE SOURCES

Music: "Scary and Mystical Music Pack" and "Casual and Arcade Music Bundle" both by Andrey Sitkov

Sfx: SoundBible.com
